email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 5000MT of Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. Our initial freight quote is USD45.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high for our current budget. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and the laytime details?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Daniel Kim
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD15,000 per day, and the laytime is 5 days.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Daniel Kim
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Houston on 1st October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Daniel Kim
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Houston to Rotterdam - Contract
email_chain.body:
Dear Daniel,

Thank you for your confirmation. I have attached the contract for your review. Please let me know if there are any issues or if you need further assistance.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services
